channel.title: Reflections on Shin
channel.description: Recent content in Reflections on Shin

item.title: Things I learned recently
item.description: It’s recently been 6 months since I started my first full-time job as a software engineer after graduating from university last year. A lot has changed in my life, and I thought I’d write about the things I’ve learned about myself, career, and life in the past half a year. I don’t claim most of these to be original thoughts: many are an amalgamation of things I’ve read/heard about but have only recently begun to fully appreciate.
